name: MEMES DIE TOO
description:
MEMES DIE TOO

Hello memer…

To join the Memelords and Memeladies Society, you will create a new account on THE NETWORK™. You will post one meme per day until one of your memes reaches one thousand shares. You could even get some fans along the way!

But be careful on the internet... some THE NETWORK™ users are also present on FaithBlog ©. If they repost your meme there, we will cringe  very fast and your meme will be considered cliché!

Good luck, memer.

FEATURES

😎 Choose memes from your very personal collection

💅 Post them and watch them spread through THE NETWORK ™

🤩 Acquire fans and give them tasks to help you join the 💀 Society

Entry to GAME OFF 2022

This one-month long jam was hosted by Github during November 2022. The theme was "cliché".
https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2022

Team

There's only me! I am a professional-and-currently-looking-for-a-job game designer from France. If you are looking for someone in this position and like my game, please reach out!

Community

Wow, you read the description until here! Congratulations! If you liked the game and want to join the memers community, head to https://discord.gg/EDdvJ367 . Clicking this link is an alternate way to win the game.
